review: I was given this drug plus metronidazole for a suspected pelvic inflammation. Woke up in the morning with sweats, severe panic attack, severe confusion and very dry mouth. I was paranoid and scared to go back to sleep. Called the GP in the morning and they told me to change antibiotics however I refused and now I am waiting for an examination of the pelvis .The only symptom I had was abnormal discharge.Canâ€™t trust these doctors
